mapper.update: update oms_order_operate_history set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operate_man = #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, order_id, operate_man, create_time, order_status, note from oms_order_operate_history
